__e: You seem like just the boring, stable person I need in my life right now, so I'm gonna ask you two things... Don't ever lie to me and don't ever, ever tell me to relax.
Never lie to me, I'll never hurt you.
Josh... you're my son, and I love you very much... but don't lie to me again, okay?
Well, you found a way to lie to me, and keep lying to me.
And what about lying to me? Is that a one time thing, too?
You keep lying to me, and if it has nothing to do with Kate's death, I don't understand why.
